title: Inquire About an Alumni Event
description: An alumnus received an email about Homecoming weekend and has questions about registering for an event.

tasks.description: Identify the alumnus and the event they are interested in (e.g., 'Alumni Tailgate Party').
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the alumnus's identity and the event details.

tasks.description: Explain the event details, including cost, time, location, and registration deadline.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides all relevant event information.

tasks.description: Assist the alumnus with completing the event registration over the phone.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully registers the alumnus and processes their payment.
